So I went down to the end of tired, and just out of curiosity I hung a right. My mother was there, and she said i thought I told you to go to sleep.

Motherhood is a journey. Yet while becoming a mother is a path that is well worn, navigated by billions of women across the globe throughout human history, the experience is brand new for each woman every time a baby enters this world.
Motherhood is an adventure that defies explanation; you just have to experience it for yourself.
Motherhood is the ultimate opportunity to learn the lesson of surrender. The more rigid you are, the harder the process is.
Motherhood may force you to find a new way to define yourself.
As a mother, you will of necessity give birth to the motherhood mindset that for a time will act like the North Star in orienting your path in life.
As the practical realities of life demand more of you attention, the motherhood mindset will recede.
You always been your mother's daughter, and this relationship, whether good or bad, has always been near the center of your identity.
All mothers want validation for their identity, and to that end you will probably find yourself developing support network.
Motherhood will also mold you in unexpected, amazing ways, but becoming a mama doesn't mean leaving the woman you are behind.
Pregnancy is about more than simply growing a baby. It's about becoming a mama.
Motherhood changes you long before the baby is born.
Motherhood is about defining an experience as any human being can undergo.
Even is motherhood has been a lifelong desire, once it arrives, many women find themselves feeling lost somewhere who they were before and who they think they should be now.
The older I get the more of my mother I see in myself.
As we carry our baby inside us, we know almost nothing about it that distinguishes it from anyone's baby-except that we love it unlike any other baby.
Making a decision to have a child-it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
Life is always rich and steady time when you are waiting for something to happen or to hatch.
When a woman, gives birth her waters break and she pours out the child and the child runs free.
For nine months I grew a human being inside my belly and then I pushed it out my vagina and now I'm feeding it with my boob. Biology is so...weird.
Life is a flame that is always burning itself out, but it catches fire again everytime a child is born.
Giving birth is little more than a set of muscular contractions granting passage of a child. Then the mother is born.
